actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To encourage the States to streamline the adoption process and make their adoption laws more uniform.

summary.text: Model Adoption Act of 1996 - Amends the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1993 to set as a prerequisite for Federal grants to State courts to assess and improve handling of foster care and adoption proceedings that the State in which a court is located has specified provisions of the Uniform Adoption Act in effect and operation.

titles.title: To encourage the States to streamline the adoption process and make their adoption laws more uniform.
